verses.verse: The <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H5662>Obadiah.<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> concerning <S%H123>Edom;<s%> We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> a <S%H8052>rumor<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H854><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and an <S%H6735>ambassador<s%> is <S%H7971>sent<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> <S%H6965>Arise<s%> ye, and let us rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> her in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> thee <S%H6996>small<s%> among the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> art <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H959>despised.<s%>

The <S%H2087>pride<s%> of thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> hath <S%H5377>deceived<s%> thee, thou that <S%H7931>dwellest<s%> in the <S%H2288>clefts<s%> of the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> whose <S%H7675>habitation<s%> is <S%H4791>high;<s%> that <S%H559>saith<s%> in his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> shall bring me <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground?<s%>

Though <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H1361>exalt<s%> thyself as the <S%H5404>eagle,<s%> and <S%H518>though<s%> thou <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H7064>nest<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> <S%H4480>thence<s%> <S%H8033><s%> will I bring thee <S%H3381>down,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

If <S%H518><s%> <S%H1590>thieves<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to thee, <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H7703>robbers<s%> by <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H349>(how<s%> art thou cut <S%H1820>off!)<s%> would they <S%H3808>not<s%> have <S%H1589>stolen<s%> till they had <S%H1767>enough?<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> the grape <S%H1219>gatherers<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to thee, would they <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H7604>leave<s%> some <S%H5955>grapes?<s%>
How <S%H349><s%> are the things of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> searched <S%H2664>out!<s%> how are his hidden <S%H4710>things<s%> sought <S%H1158>up!<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> of thy <S%H1285>confederacy<s%> have <S%H7971>brought<s%> thee even <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H1366>border:<s%> the <S%H376>men<s%> that were at <S%H7965>peace<s%> with thee have <S%H5377>deceived<s%> thee, and <S%H3201>prevailed<s%> against thee; they that eat thy <S%H3899>bread<s%> have <S%H7760>laid<s%> a <S%H4204>wound<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> thee: there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H8394>understanding<s%> in him.

Shall I <S%H3808>not<s%> in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> even <S%H6>destroy<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men out of <S%H4480>Edom,<s%> <S%H123><s%> and <S%H8394>understanding<s%> out of the <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> of <S%H6215>Esau?<s%>

And thy <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men, O <S%H8487>Teman,<s%> shall be <S%H2865>dismayed,<s%> to the end <S%H4616>that<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H4480>mount<s%> <S%H2022><s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> may be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> by <S%H4480>slaughter.<s%> <S%H6993><s%>

For thy <S%H4480>violence<s%> <S%H2555><s%> against thy <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H955>shame<s%> shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> thee, and thou shalt be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou <S%H5975>stoodest<s%> on the other <S%H4480>side,<s%> <S%H5048><s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that the <S%H2114>strangers<s%> carried away <S%H7617>captive<s%> his <S%H2428>forces,<s%> and <S%H5237>foreigners<s%> entered <S%H935>into<s%> his <S%H8179>gates,<s%> and <S%H3032>cast<s%> <S%H1486>lots<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> wast as <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> them.

But thou shouldest <S%H408>not<s%> have <S%H7200>looked<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thy <S%H251>brother<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that he became a <S%H5237>stranger;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> shouldest thou have <S%H8055>rejoiced<s%> over the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H6>destruction;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> shouldest thou have spoken <S%H1431>proudly<s%> <S%H6310><s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>distress.<s%>

Thou shouldest <S%H408>not<s%> have <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity;<s%> <S%H1571>yea,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shouldest <S%H408>not<s%> have <S%H7200>looked<s%> on their <S%H7451>affliction<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> have <S%H7971>laid<s%> hands on their <S%H2428>substance<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of their <S%H343>calamity;<s%>

Neither <S%H408><s%> shouldest thou have <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H6563>crossway,<s%> to cut <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> those of his that did <S%H6412>escape;<s%> <S%H408>neither<s%> shouldest thou have delivered <S%H5462>up<s%> those of his that did <S%H8300>remain<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>distress.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen:<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>done,<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> unto thee: thy <S%H1576>reward<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> upon thine own <S%H7218>head.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H834>as<s%> ye have <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain,<s%> so shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H8548>continually,<s%> yea, they shall <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and they shall swallow <S%H3886>down,<s%> and they shall <S%H1961>be<s%> as though they had <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>been.<s%>

But upon <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6413>deliverance,<s%> and there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6944>holiness;<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4180>possessions.<s%>

And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> a <S%H3852>flame,<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau<s%> for <S%H7179>stubble,<s%> and they shall <S%H1814>kindle<s%> in them, and <S%H398>devour<s%> them; and there shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> any <S%H8300>remaining<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.

And they of the <S%H5045>south<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau;<s%> and they of the <S%H8219>plain<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and they shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> and the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria:<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> shall <S%H853>possess<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And the <S%H1546>captivity<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2426>host<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall possess <S%H834>that<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> even <S%H5704>unto<s%> <S%H6886>Zarephath;<s%> and the <S%H1546>captivity<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in <S%H5614>Sepharad,<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

And <S%H3467>saviors<s%> shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> on <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> to <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H853>the<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H6215>Esau;<s%> and the <S%H4410>kingdom<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD's.<s%>
